tests.title: Depression Assessment Test
tests.description: A comprehensive screening tool for depression symptoms
tests.detailedDescription: This test helps identify symptoms of depression and their severity. It uses standardized questions to assess your emotional well-being over the past two weeks.

tests.title: Anxiety Screening Test
tests.detailedDescription: A screening tool designed to measure anxiety levels and identify potential anxiety disorders. The test evaluates both physical and psychological symptoms.

tests.title: Stress Level Assessment
tests.description: Evaluate your current stress levels and coping mechanisms
tests.detailedDescription: Assess your current stress levels and identify potential stressors in your life. Includes recommendations for stress management techniques.

tests.title: Sleep Quality Index
tests.description: Analyze your sleep patterns and quality
tests.detailedDescription: Evaluate your sleep quality, patterns, and potential sleep disorders. Provides recommendations for better sleep hygiene.

tests.title: Social Anxiety Evaluation
tests.detailedDescription: Evaluate symptoms of social anxiety and their impact on daily life. Includes situations-based questions.

tests.title: Academic Stress Assessment
tests.detailedDescription: Specifically designed for students to assess stress levels related to academic performance and workload.

tests.title: Emotional Intelligence Quiz
tests.detailedDescription: Comprehensive assessment of emotional intelligence including self-awareness, empathy, and social skills.

tests.title: Mindfulness Readiness Assessment
tests.detailedDescription: Assess your readiness to begin mindfulness practices and identify potential areas of focus.

tests.title: Relationship Satisfaction Scale
tests.detailedDescription: Evaluate satisfaction levels in various relationships including family, friends, and romantic partners.

tests.title: Self-Esteem Evaluation
tests.detailedDescription: Comprehensive assessment of self-esteem levels and factors affecting self-worth.

tests.title: Study Habits Assessment
tests.description: Evaluate your study patterns and effectiveness
tests.detailedDescription: Analyze your study habits and receive recommendations for improvement.

tests.title: Time Management Skills Test
tests.detailedDescription: Evaluate how effectively you manage your time and identify areas for improvement.

tests.title: Eating Habits Assessment
tests.detailedDescription: Assess your eating habits and relationship with food. Includes nutritional awareness evaluation.

tests.title: Procrastination Tendency Test
tests.detailedDescription: Identify your procrastination patterns and receive strategies for improvement.

tests.title: Resilience Scale
tests.detailedDescription: Measure your ability to bounce back from difficulties and adapt to change.

tests.title: Communication Style Analysis
tests.detailedDescription: Analyze your communication style and learn how it affects your relationships.

tests.title: Goal Setting Assessment
tests.detailedDescription: Assess how effectively you set and achieve personal and academic goals.

tests.title: Peer Pressure Resilience Test
tests.detailedDescription: Evaluate your ability to maintain personal values under peer pressure.

tests.title: Digital Wellness Assessment
tests.description: Assess your digital habits and wellness
tests.detailedDescription: Evaluate your relationship with technology and digital media consumption.

tests.title: Career Interest Inventory
tests.description: Explore your career interests and preferences
tests.detailedDescription: Comprehensive assessment to help identify potential career paths based on your interests and strengths.
